title-group.article-title: The Four Critical Elements of Analytic Wargame Design

bio.p: Lieutenant Colonel Brian Wade is an Army aviation officer in the functional area 49 (Operations Research and Systems Analysis—ORSA). While at the Center for Army Analysis, in the campaign wargaming division and later the strategic wargaming division, he developed, directed, umpired, and participated in many wargames at the operational and strategic levels of war for different Combatant Commands, Army Service Component Commands, and other Department of Defense agencies.
